articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: Long Covid More Severe In Women Than Men, Suggests Study - Mint
articles.description: The study found that 91% of patients, who were followed up for five months on average, continued to experience Covid-19 symptoms. Breathlessness was the most common symptom of long Covid-19, followed by fatigue
articles.content:
Post-coronavirus complications, also called long Covid syndrome, induce more symptoms in women than men, a new study has found. 
The new research, published in the Journal of Women's Health, reveale… [+2402 chars]
